column4: is this the place (or can anyone suggest somewhere better) to ask questions regarding upgrading breezy to the dapper repositories? I'm stuck because initramfs-tools 0.40 won't install because my kernel is not >= 2.6.12, and kernel 2.6.15 won't install because initramfs-tools isn't >= 0.36, after issuing a apt-get dist-upgrade
Mine updated fine, and I had real problems with initramfs
Those were with USING it though, not installing. (I needed to add USB modules and a pause to boot my USB drive from CDROM)
